text: The 1912–13 Massachusetts Agricultural College Aggies men's ice hockey season was the 5th season of play for the program. ==Season== Building upon the recent success of the young program, the Aggies scheduled three games against the upper echelon teams. Mass Ag lost all three games but in their other three matches the Aggies proved they were still among the best of the rest. ==Roster== ==Standings== ==Schedule and Results== |- !colspan=12 style=";" | Regular Season ==References== Category:UMass Minutemen ice hockey seasons Massachusetts Agricultural College Aggies Massachusetts Agricultural College Aggies Category:1912 in sports in Massachusetts Category:1913 in sports in Massachusetts
title: 1912–13 Massachusetts Agricultural College Aggies men's ice hockey season
